00032 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00033 #define _a 0x01  //    aaaaaa
00034 #define _b 0x02  //    f    b
00035 #define _c 0x04  //    f    b
00036 #define _d 0x08  //    gggggg
00037 #define _e 0x10  //    e    c
00038 #define _f 0x20  //    e    c
00039 #define _g 0x40  //    dddddd
00040 
00041 const u8 TAB_7SEG[_7SEG_CodeEnd + 1] =
00042 {
00043   /* 0 */ (_a | _b | _c | _d | _e | _f),
00044   /* 1 */ (_b | _c),
00045   /* 2 */ (_a | _b | _d | _e | _g),
00046   /* 3 */ (_a | _b | _c | _d | _g),
00047   /* 4 */ (_b | _c | _f | _g),
00048   /* 5 */ (_a | _c | _d | _f | _g),
00049   /* 6 */ (_a | _c | _d | _e | _f | _g),
00050   /* 7 */ (_a | _b | _c | _f),
00051   /* 8 */ (_a | _b | _c | _d | _e | _f | _g),
00052   /* 9 */ (_a | _b | _c | _d | _f | _g),
00053   /* A */ (_a | _b | _c | _e | _f | _g),
00054   /* b */ (_c | _d | _e | _f | _g),
00055   /* C */ (_a | _d | _e | _f),
00056   /* d */ (_b | _c | _d | _e | _g),
00057   /* E */ (_a | _d | _e | _f | _g),
00058   /* F */ (_a | _e | _f | _g),
00059   /* H */ (_b | _c | _e | _f | _g),
00060   /* - */ (_g)
00061 };
00062 
00063 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G1_DIGIT[4][7] =
00064 {
00065   {_4A,_4B,_4C,_4D,_4E,_4F,_4G},
00066   {_3A,_3B,_3C,_3D,_3E,_3F,_3G},
00067   {_2A,_2B,_2C,_2D,_2E,_2F,_2G},
00068   {_1A,_1B,_1C,_1D,_1E,_1F,_1G}
00069 };
00070 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G1_Unit[3] = {_DEGREE_1, _PM, _AM};
00071 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G1_Dot[3] = {_S5_G1_Dot1, _S4_G1_Dot2, _S3_G1_Dot3};
00072 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_G1_TimeDot = _S1_G1_TIME_Dot;
00073 
00074 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G2_DIGIT[5][7] =
00075 {
00076   {_9A,_9B,_9C,_9D,_9E,_9F,_9G},
00077   {_8A,_8B,_8C,_8D,_8E,_8F,_8G},
00078   {_7A,_7B,_7C,_7D,_7E,_7F,_7G},
00079   {_6A,_6B,_6C,_6D,_6E,_6F,_6G},
00080   {_5A,_5B,_5C,_5D,_5E,_5F,_5G}
00081 };
00082 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G2_Unit[4] = {_DEGREE_2, _uA, _mA, _mV};
00083 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_G2_Dot[4] = {_S11_G2_Dot1, _S10_G2_Dot2, _S9_G2_Dot3, _S8_G2_Dot4};
00084 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_G2_TimeDot = _S2_G2_TIME_Dot;
00085 
00086 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_Voice_Level[6] = {_V_OFF, _V_ON, _V_L1, _V_L2, _V_L3, _V_L4};
00087 
00088 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_BT             = _BT;
00089 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_BT_UpStream    = _BT_U;
00090 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_BT_DownStream  = _BT_D;
00091 
00092 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_RF_Level[3]        = {_RF_L1, _RF_L2, _RF_L3};
00093 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_RF_UpStream    = _RF_U;
00094 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_RF_DownStream  = _RF_D;
00095 
00096 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_BAT_Frame  = _BAT;
00097 const COM_SEG_Type TAB_BAT_Level[3]   = {_BAT3, _BAT2, _BAT1};
00098 
00099 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_HOLTEK = _S6_HOLTEK;
00100 const COM_SEG_Type COM_SEG_Minus  = _S7_MINUS;
00101 
00102 const u8 LCD_Matrix_X_Size = _MATRIX_X_SIZE;
00103 const u8 LCD_Matrix_Y_Size = _MATRIX_Y_SIZE;
00104 
00105 const u8 TAB_MATRIX_X_BIT_INDEX[_MATRIX_X_SIZE] = _MATRIX_X_BIT_INDEX;

00108 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00110   * @brief Initialize LCD.
00111   * @retval None
00112   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00113 void LCD_Init_ESK32_A3A31(void)
00114 {
00115   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00116      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00117      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00118   */
00119   LCD_InitTypeDef LCD_InitStructure;
00120   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00121   CKCUClock.Bit.LCDC          = 1;
00122   CKCUClock.Bit.LCDR          = 1;
00123   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO          = 1;
00124   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00125 
00126   /* For ESK32-A3A31 8 COM x 33 SEG, Please refer to ESK32_A3A31_HW_INFO_57xxxSK for pin assigment          */
00127   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM0_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00128   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM1_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00129   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM2_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00130   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM3_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00131   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM4_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM4_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00132   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM5_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM5_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00133   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM6_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM6_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00134   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_COM7_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_COM7_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00135 
00136   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG0_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG0_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00137   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG1_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG1_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00138   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG2_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG2_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00139   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG3_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG3_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00140   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG4_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG4_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00141   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG5_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG5_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00142   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG6_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG6_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00143   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG7_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG7_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00144   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG8_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG8_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00145   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG9_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_LCD_SEG9_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00146   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG10_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG10_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00147   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG11_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG11_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00148   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG12_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG12_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00149   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG13_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG13_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00150   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG14_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG14_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00151   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG15_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG15_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00152   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG16_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG16_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00153   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG17_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG17_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00154   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG18_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG18_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00155   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG19_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG19_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00156   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG20_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG20_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00157   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG21_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG21_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00158   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG22_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG22_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00159   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG23_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG23_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00160   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG24_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG24_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00161  #if (_MATRIX_X_SIZE == 20)
00162   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG25_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG25_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00163   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG26_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG26_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00164   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG27_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG27_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00165   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG28_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG28_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00166   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG29_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG29_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00167   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG30_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG30_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00168   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG31_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG31_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00169   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LCD_SEG32_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LCD_SEG32_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LCD);
00170   #endif
00171 
00172   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00173      Must wait until the LCDENS = 0 before change the LCD control register.
00174   */
00175   while (LCD_GetFlagStatus(LCD_FLAG_ENS) == 1);
00176 
00177   /* LCDCLK config                                                                                          */
00178   CKCU_LCDClockConfig(CKCU_LCDSRC_LSI);     /* Using internal 32 kHz RC oscillator clock. LCDCLK = 32 kHz.  */
00179 
00180   /* LCD initialization                                                                                     */
00181   /* Frame rate = LCDCLK / (LCD_Divider_25 * LCD_Prescaler_4) * duty                                        */
00182   /*            =  32000 / (25 * 4) * 1/8                                                                   */
00183   /*            =  40 Hz                                                                                    */
00184   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_Divider = LCD_Divider_25;
00185   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_Prescaler = LCD_Prescaler_4;
00186   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_Duty = LCD_Duty_1_8;
00187   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_Bias = LCD_Bias_1_4;
00188   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_VoltageSource = LCD_VoltageSource_Internal;
00189   LCD_InitStructure.LCD_Waveform = LCD_Type_B_Waveform;
00190   LCD_DriverInit(&LCD_InitStructure);
00191 
00192   /* Enable High Drive Mode                                                                                 */
00193   LCD_HighDriveConfig(LCD_HighDrive_Static);
00194 
00195   /* Increase LCD drive capability.                                                                         */
00196   LCD_HalfRLCmd(ENABLE);  /* Enable half of the RL(low value resistor).                                     */
00197 
00198   /* LCD Internal Charge Pump 3.25V                                                                         */
00199   LCD_ChargePumpConfig(LCD_ChargePump_3V25);
00200 
00201   /* Wait for charge pump ready                                                                             */
00202   while (LCD_GetFlagStatus(LCD_FLAG_RDY) == RESET);
00203 
00204   /* LCD Interrupt                                                                                          */
00205   LCD_ClearFlag(LCD_CLR_UDD | LCD_CLR_SOF);
00206   LCD_IntConfig(LCD_INT_UDD | LCD_INT_SOF, ENABLE);
00207   NVIC_EnableIRQ(LCD_IRQn);
00208 
00209   /* Enable LCD                                                                                             */
00210   LCD_Cmd(ENABLE);
00211 }
00212 
00213 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00214   * @brief Pixel ON or OFF.
00215   * @param pixel  : defined by COM_SEG_Type structure
00216   * @param on_off : LCD_PIXEL_OFF, LCD_PIXEL_ON
00217   * @retval None
00218   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00219 void LCD_PixelConfig(COM_SEG_Type pixel, LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum on_off)
00220 {
00221   if (on_off)
00222     HT_LCD->RAM[pixel.RAM_Index] |= (u32)0x1 << pixel.BIT_Index;
00223   else
00224     HT_LCD->RAM[pixel.RAM_Index] &= ~((u32)0x1 << pixel.BIT_Index);
00225 }
00226 
00227 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00228   * @brief Show char on specific digit in digits group 1.
00229   * @param digit_n : LCD_DIGIT_0, LCD_DIGIT_1, LCD_DIGIT_2, LCD_DIGIT_3
00230   * @param char_id : _7SEG_0 ~ _7SEG_9,
00231   *                  _7SEG_A, _7SEG_b, _7SEG_C, _7SEG_d, _7SEG_E, _7SEG_F, _7SEG_H, _7SEG_Minus
00232   * @retval None
00233   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00234 void LCD_show_Group1_number(LCD_DIGIT_ID_Enum digit_n, _7SEG_ID_Enum char_id)
00235 {
00236   u8 code = TAB_7SEG[char_id];
00237   u8 i, mask = 0x1;
00238 
00239   if (digit_n <= LCD_DIGIT_3)
00240   {
00241     for (i = 0; i < 7; i++)
00242     {
00243       LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G1_DIGIT[digit_n][i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(code & mask));
00244       mask <<= 1;
00245     }
00246   }
00247 }
00248 
00249 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00250   * @brief Show char on specific digit in digits group 2.
00251   * @param digit_n : LCD_DIGIT_0, LCD_DIGIT_1, LCD_DIGIT_2, LCD_DIGIT_3, LCD_DIGIT_4
00252   * @param char_id : _7SEG_0 ~ _7SEG_9,
00253   *                  _7SEG_A, _7SEG_b, _7SEG_C, _7SEG_d, _7SEG_E, _7SEG_F, _7SEG_H, _7SEG_Minus
00254   * @retval None
00255   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00256 void LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_ID_Enum digit_n, _7SEG_ID_Enum char_id)
00257 {
00258   u8 code = TAB_7SEG[char_id];
00259   u8 i, mask = 0x1;
00260 
00261   if (digit_n <= LCD_DIGIT_4)
00262   {
00263     for (i = 0; i < 7; i++)
00264     {
00265       LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G2_DIGIT[digit_n][i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(code & mask));
00266       mask <<= 1;
00267     }
00268   }
00269 }
00270 
00271 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00272   * @brief Show Voice configuration.
00273   * @param level : LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_OFF, LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_1, LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_2, LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_3
00274   *                LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_4, LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_5
00275   * @retval None
00276   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00277 void LCD_show_VoiceConfig(LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_Enum level)
00278 {
00279   u32 i;
00280 
00281   if (level == 0)
00282   {
00283     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_Voice_Level[0], LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00284 
00285     for (i = 1; i < 6; i++)
00286       LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_Voice_Level[i], LCD_PIXEL_OFF);
00287   }
00288   else
00289   {
00290     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_Voice_Level[0], LCD_PIXEL_OFF);
00291 
00292     for (i = 1; i < 6; i++)
00293       LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_Voice_Level[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i <= level));
00294   }
00295 }
00296 
00297 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00298   * @brief Show RF signal level.
00299   * @param level : LCD_RF_LEVEL_OFF, LCD_RF_LEVEL_1, LCD_RF_LEVEL_2, LCD_RF_LEVEL_3
00300   * @retval None
00301   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00302 void LCD_show_RF_Level(LCD_RF_LEVEL_Enum level)
00303 {
00304   int i;
00305   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00306     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_RF_Level[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i < level));
00307 }
00308 
00309 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00310   * @brief Show Battery Volumn level.
00311   * @param level : LCD_BAT_LEVEL_OFF, LCD_BAT_LEVEL_1, LCD_BAT_LEVEL_2, LCD_BAT_LEVEL_3
00312   * @retval None
00313   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00314 void LCD_show_BAT_Level(LCD_BAT_LEVEL_Enum level)
00315 {
00316   int i;
00317   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00318     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_BAT_Level[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i < level));
00319 }

00321 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00322   * @brief Show the Unit of digits group 1.
00323   * @param unit_id : LCD_UNIT_DEGREE, LCD_UNIT_PM, LCD_UNIT_AM
00324   * @retval None
00325   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00326 void LCD_show_Group1_Unit(LCD_UNIT_Enum unit_id)
00327 {
00328   int i;
00329   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00330     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G1_Unit[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i == unit_id));
00331 }
00332 
00333 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00334   * @brief Show the Unit of digits group 2.

00337   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00338 void LCD_show_Group2_Unit(LCD_UNIT_Enum unit_id)
00339 {
00340   int i;
00341   for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00342     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G2_Unit[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i == unit_id));
00343 }

00345 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00346   * @brief Show the Dot of digits group 1.

00349   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00350 void LCD_show_Group1_Dot(LCD_DIGIT_ID_Enum digit_n)

00352   int i;
00353   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00354     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G1_Dot[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i == digit_n));
00355 }

00357 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00358   * @brief Show the Dot of digits group 2.
00359   * @param digit_n : LCD_DIGIT_0, LCD_DIGIT_1, LCD_DIGIT_2, LCD_DIGIT_3
00360   * @retval None
00361   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00362 void LCD_show_Group2_Dot(LCD_DIGIT_ID_Enum digit_n)
00363 {
00364   int i;
00365   for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00366     LCD_PixelConfig(TAB_G2_Dot[i], (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(i == digit_n));
00367 }
00368 
00369 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00370   * @brief Turn ON or turn OFF the point of Dot Matrix.
00371   * @param StartX : X position
00372   * @param StartY : Y position
00373   * @param on_off :
00374   * @retval None
00375   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00376 void LCD_show_Matrix(u8 StartX, u8 StartY, LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum on_off)
00377 {
00378   u8 bit_index, ram_index;
00379 
00380   if (StartX >= _MATRIX_X_SIZE)
00381     StartX = _MATRIX_X_SIZE-1;
00382 
00383   if (StartY >= _MATRIX_Y_SIZE)
00384     StartY = _MATRIX_Y_SIZE-1;
00385 
00386   bit_index = TAB_MATRIX_X_BIT_INDEX[StartX];
00387   ram_index = TAB_MATRIX_Y_RAM_INDEX[StartY] + (bit_index >> 5);
00388   bit_index =  bit_index & 0x1F;
00389 
00390   if (on_off)
00391     HT_LCD->RAM[ram_index] |= (u32)0x1 << bit_index;
00392   else
00393     HT_LCD->RAM[ram_index] &= ~((u32)0x1 << bit_index);
00394 }
00395 
00396 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00397   * @brief Turn ON or turn OFF the point of Dot Matrix.
00398   * @param StartX : X position
00399   * @param StartY : Y position
00400   * @param W : Width
00401   * @param H : Height
00402   * @param on_off :
00403   * @retval None
00404   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00405 void LCD_MatrixClear(u8 StartX, u8 StartY, u8 W, u8 H, LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum on_off)
00406 {
00407   u32 i;
00408   u8 x, y;
00409 
00410   x = StartX;
00411   y = StartY;
00412   i = (u32)W * H;
00413 
00414   while (i--)
00415   {
00416     LCD_show_Matrix(x, y++, on_off);
00417 
00418     if (y >= (StartY + H))
00419     {
00420       y = StartY;
00421       x++;
00422     }
00423   }
00424 }
00425 
00426 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00427   * @brief Turn ON or turn OFF the point of Dot Matrix.
00428   * @param StartX : X position
00429   * @param StartY : Y position
00430   * @param pPicture : Picture
00431   * @retval None
00432   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00433 void LCD_show_Picture(u8 StartX, u8 StartY, uc8 pPicture[])
00434 {
00435   u8 W = pPicture[0];
00436   u8 H = pPicture[1];
00437   u8* pData = (u8*)&pPicture[2];
00438   u32 i;
00439   u8 d, x, y;
00440 
00441   x = StartX;
00442   y = StartY;
00443   i = (u32)W * H;
00444   d = *pData;
00445   while (i--)
00446   {
00447     LCD_show_Matrix(x, y++, (LCD_PIXEL_CONTROL_Enum)(d&0x1));
00448     LCD_SetUpdateDisplayRequest();
00449     d >>= 1;
00450 
00451     if (y >= (StartY + H))
00452     {
00453       pData++;
00454       d = *pData;
00455       y = StartY;
00456       x++;
00457     }
00458   }
00459 }

For complete information of HT32 Series 32-bit Microcontrollers platform visit Holtek Website
